verses.name: Mark 8:23
verses.text: And he took the blind man by the hand, and led him out of the town; and when he had spit on his eyes, and put his hands upon him, he asked him if he saw ought.

verses.name: Mark 8:24
verses.text: And he looked up, and said, I see men as trees, walking.

verses.name: Mark 8:25
verses.text: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes, and made him look up: and he was restored, and saw every man clearly.

verses.name: Mark 8:26
verses.text: And he sent him away to his house, saying, Neither go into the town, nor tell it to any in the town.
